014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018
019import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.FieldContext;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFail;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFailCreate;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueCache;
024
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Objects;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.StringJoiner;
031import java.util.function.Function;
032
033import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
034import com.google.common.base.Splitter;
035
036/**
037 * Common properties for a field.
038 */
039public abstract class FieldDefinition<T> {
040
041    protected FieldDefinition() {
042    }
043
044    @VisibleForTesting
045    protected FieldDefinition(String id) {
046        this.id = id;
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Name of the build property to define. Field injected by Maven.
051     */
052    String id = null;
053
054    /**
055     * True skips the parsing of this definition. Field injected by Maven.
056     */
057    boolean skip = false;
058
059    /**
060     * Whether to export this number directly. Field injected by Maven.
061     */
062    boolean export = false;
063
064    /**
065     * Name of the property from the properties file. Field injected by Maven.
066     */
067    String propertyNameInFile = null;
068
069    /**
070     * Name of the properties file to persist the count. Field injected by Maven.
071     */
072    File propertyFile = null;
073
074    /**
075     * What to do when the property is missing from the file.
076     */
077    private IgnoreWarnFailCreate onMissingFile = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.FAIL;
078
079    public void setOnMissingFile(String onMissingFile) {
080        this.onMissingFile = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.forString(onMissingFile);
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * What to do when the property is missing from the file.
085     */
086    private IgnoreWarnFailCreate onMissingFileProperty = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.FAIL;
087
088    public void setOnMissingFileProperty(String onMissingFileProperty) {
089        this.onMissingFileProperty = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.forString(onMissingFileProperty);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * What to do when a referenced property can not be resolved.
094     */
095    private IgnoreWarnFail onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.FAIL;
096
097    public void setOnMissingProperty(String onMissingProperty) {
098        this.onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFail.forString(onMissingProperty);
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * The initial value for this field. Field injected by Maven.
103     */
104    String initialValue = null;
105
106    /**
107     * Format for this element. Field injected by Maven.
108     */
109    String format = null;
110
111    /**
112     * Comma separated list of String transformers.
113     */
114    private List<String> transformers = List.of();
115
116    void setTransformers(String transformers) {
117        this.transformers = Splitter.on(",")
118            .omitEmptyStrings()
119            .trimResults()
120            .splitToList(transformers);
121    }
122
123    public abstract <U extends Field<?, ?>> U createField(FieldContext context, ValueCache valueCache) throws IOException;
124
125    public String getId() {
126        return id;
127    }
128
129    public boolean isSkip() {
130        return skip;
131    }
132
133    public List<String> getTransformers() {
134        return transformers;
135    }
136
137    public Optional<String> getInitialValue() {
138        return Optional.ofNullable(initialValue);
139    }
140
141    public boolean isExport() {
142        return export;
143    }
144
145    public String getPropertyNameInFile() {
146        return Objects.requireNonNullElse(propertyNameInFile, id);
147    }
148
149    public Optional<File> getPropertyFile() {
150        return Optional.ofNullable(propertyFile);
151    }
152
153    public IgnoreWarnFailCreate getOnMissingFile() {
154        return onMissingFile;
155    }
156
157    public IgnoreWarnFailCreate getOnMissingFileProperty() {
158        return onMissingFileProperty;
159    }
160
161    public IgnoreWarnFail getOnMissingProperty() {
162        return onMissingProperty;
163    }
164
165    public Function<T, String> formatResult() {
166        return value -> Optional.ofNullable(value).map(getFormat()).orElse("");
167    }
168
169    public Function<T, String> getFormat() {
170        return format == null ? String::valueOf : v -> String.format(format, v);
171    }
172
173    public void check() {
174        checkState(id != null, "the id element must not be empty!");
175
176        if (propertyNameInFile != null) {
177            checkState(propertyFile != null, "can not define <propertyNameInFile> without defining <propertyFile>!");
178        }
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public String toString() {
183        return new StringJoiner(", ", FieldDefinition.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
184            .add("id='" + id + "'")
185            .add("skip=" + skip)
186            .add("export=" + export)
187            .add("propertyNameInFile='" + propertyNameInFile + "'")
188            .add("propertyFile=" + propertyFile)
189            .add("onMissingFile=" + onMissingFile)
190            .add("onMissingFileProperty=" + onMissingFileProperty)
191            .add("onMissingProperty=" + onMissingProperty)
192            .add("initialValue='" + initialValue + "'")
193            .add("format='" + format + "'")
194            .add("transformers=" + transformers)
195            .toString();
196    }
197
198    @Override
199    public boolean equals(Object o) {
200        if (this == o) {
201            return true;
202        }
203        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
204            return false;
205        }
206        FieldDefinition<?> that = (FieldDefinition<?>) o;
207        return skip == that.skip && export == that.export && Objects.equals(id, that.id) && Objects.equals(propertyNameInFile, that.propertyNameInFile)
208            && Objects.equals(propertyFile, that.propertyFile) && Objects.equals(onMissingFile, that.onMissingFile)
209            && Objects.equals(onMissingProperty, that.onMissingProperty) && Objects.equals(initialValue, that.initialValue)
210            && Objects.equals(format, that.format) && Objects.equals(transformers, that.transformers);
211    }
212
213    @Override
214    public int hashCode() {
215        return Objects.hash(id, skip, export, propertyNameInFile, propertyFile, onMissingFile, onMissingProperty, initialValue, format, transformers);
216    }
217}
